item.description:
It is easy to miss - there is no sign. Just a gravel parking area on your right just after the left turn toward the airport. JC Phillips abuts the Project Adventure lands - so the woods go on for quite a way beyond the park boundary.
One drawback is that is shares a driveway with a private residence - so you usually have to park in the gravel crescent right off 97 and walk the 1/4 mile to the entrance. There is a place to squeeze one or two cars up by the trail entrance though - it's worth a try.
If we can meet for a carpool that would be great! I can fit at least three or four in my truck. I know this is short notice, but I have been traveling for work.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the "Mushroom Lovers USA" sign on my truck!
item.name: J C Phillips Nature Preserve, Beverly, Ma
